means: 物体
目标
宾语
客体，对象
不赞成，反对
抱反感
提出…作反对的理由

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"目标，目的"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: aim, goal, purpose, end, target, object, objective
means: aim ：从本义"靶子"引申而来，侧重比较具体而明确的目标，但常指短期目标。
goal ：指经过考虑和选择，需经坚持不懈的努力奋斗才能达到的最终目标。
purpose ：普通用词，既指以坚决、审慎的行动去达到的目的，又指心中渴望要实际的目标。
end ：指心目中怀着的某种目的，强调结果而非过程。较正式用词。
target ：指射击的靶，军事攻击目标。引申指被攻击、批评或潮笑的目标。
object ：强调个人或需求而决定的目标、目的。
objective ：与object基本同义，但语义更广泛，指具体或很快能达到的目的，也可指军事目标。书面用词。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含有"不同意，反对"之意。
means: disagree ： 指彼此间意见或看法不同，任何言行上的不合。
differ ： 可替换disagree，但语气较温和，是disagree的委婉说法。
object ： 语气强烈，侧重对某一具体计划、行为或作法等表示反对。常跟前置词to连用。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"反对"之意。
means: object ： 多指因厌恶或反感而反对，但不一定明显地表露出来。
oppose ： 普通用词，含义广，语气强于object。多指反对一些较重大的事，隐含其正当性。
resist ： 指用力量或意志抵抗、制止对方的入侵或诱惑、影响等。
protest ： 一般指通过言语或文字或行为表示出的强烈抗议、反对。

sentence.Network_en: He thought of the baby almost as an inanimate object.
sentence.Network_cn: 他认为婴儿几乎就是毫无生命的物体。

sentence.Network_en: He made it his object in life to find the island.
sentence.Network_cn: 他把找到那座岛屿当成自己的人生目标。

sentence.Network_en: My object was to publish a scholarly work on Peter Mourne.
sentence.Network_cn: 我的目标是出版一本关于彼得·莫恩的学术著作。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 对象的建立对象（Object）就是点的一个集合，例如一台电机，一个阀门，一个传感器都可以称为为一个对象。下面详细叙述一下对 …
在物体（Object）模式下，物体运动而镜头相对固定，比如把玩手机时，物体（手机）运动，而镜头（眼睛）固定。 在场景（Scenes…
...(Transitive Verb)后面除要求跟一个宾语 (Object)之外，还要有一个宾语补足语(Object Complement),句子的意思才能完整。
物件 （object）：一个物件以「{」开始，并以「}」结束。一个物件包含一系列非排序的名称／值对，每个名称／值对之间使用「,」 …

PETS3_资料内容_资料下载_学习资料共享网 ... obey 服从.听从 objective 目标，目的 obligation 义务，责任.

jx.jx_en_mean: not influencing or restricting choices or decisions
jx.jx_cn_mean: 不影响（或不妨碍）作选择（或决定）；不成问题

lj.lj_ly: a tycoon for whom money is no object.
lj.lj_ls: 一个可以随意支配金钱的大亨。

jx.jx_en_mean: the main point or purpose of an activity
jx.jx_cn_mean: 做某事（或采取某一行动）的目的

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from medieval Latin objectum 'thing presented to the mind', neuter past participle (used as a noun) of Latin obicere, from ob- 'in the way of' + jacere 'to throw'; the verb may also partly represent the Latin frequentative objectare

encyclopedia.content: 对象object是一些相关的变量和方法的软件集

entry.def: An object is anything that has a fixed shape or form, that you can touch or see, and that is not alive.

example.ex: He squinted his eyes as though he were studying an object on the horizon.
example.tran: 他眯起眼睛，就好像在端详地平线上的某一物体。

example.ex: ...an object the shape of a coconut...

entry.def: The object of what someone is doing is their aim or purpose.

example.ex: The object of the exercise is to raise money for the charity...
He made it his object in life to find the island...
example.tran: 他把找到那座岛屿当成自己的人生目标。

entry.def: The object of a particular feeling or reaction is the person or thing it is directed towards or that causes it.

example.ex: The object of her hatred was 24-year-old model Ros French...
example.tran: 令她心头生恨的是24岁的模特罗斯·弗伦奇。

example.ex: The object of great interest at the Temple was a large marble tower built in memory of Buddha...
example.tran: 这处庙宇最引人注目的是一座为纪念佛陀而修建的宏伟的大理石塔。

entry.def: In grammar, the object of a verb or a preposition is the word or phrase which completes the structure begun by the verb or preposition.
If you object to something, you express your dislike or disapproval of it.

example.ex: A lot of people will object to the book...
example.tran: 很多人都会对这本书表示反感。

example.ex: Cullen objected that his small staff would be unable to handle the added work...
example.tran: 卡伦提出反对，说他的人手较少，无法完成额外工作。

entry.tran: 钱不成问题/距离不在话下
entry.def: If you say that money is no object or distance is no object, you are emphasizing that you are willing or able to spend as much money as necessary or travel whatever distance is required.

example.ex: Hugh Johnson's shop in London has a range of superb Swedish crystal glasses that I would have if money were no object...
example.tran: 休·约翰逊伦敦店出售各种美轮美奂的瑞典水晶玻璃杯，不考虑钱的话我都想买。

example.ex: Although he was based in Wales, distance was no object.
example.tran: 虽然他主要住在威尔士，但是距离不成问题。

means.word_mean: 1. a tangible and visible entity; an entity that can cast a shadow;

sentences.sentence: "it was full of rackets, balls and other objects"

means.word_mean: 2. the goal intended to be attained (and which is believed to be attainable);

sentences.sentence: "the sole object of her trip was to see her children"

means.word_mean: 3. (grammar) a constituent that is acted upon;
4. the focus of cognitions or feelings;
1. express or raise an objection or protest or criticism or express dissent;

sentences.sentence: "She never objected to the amount of work her boss charged her with"
"When asked to drive the truck, she objected that she did not have a driver's license"

means.word_mean: 2. be averse to or express disapproval of;

auth_sentence.content: The World Bank and the IMF did not object.
auth_sentence.res_content: The World Bank and the IMF did not object.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The World Bank and the IMF did not object.

auth_sentence.content: I get a really visceral thrill from this object.
auth_sentence.res_content: I get a really visceral thrill from this object.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I get a really visceral thrill from this object.

auth_sentence.content: He wrote of signifier, signified, and object.
auth_sentence.res_content: He wrote of signifier, signified, and object.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He wrote of signifier, signified, and object.

stems_affixes.word_buile: ab离开+ject抛→抛掉→可怜的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 形容词的,用作形容词的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ad增加+ject投掷,扔+ive……的→扔上去的,附加的
deject[v.使沮丧, 使灰心]+ed表形容词→adj.沮丧的,失望的
object[n.物体;客体,对象;目标;宾语 v.[to]反对]+ive……的→客观的[词性变化:作名词,表示"目标,目的"]
sub在下面+ject投掷,扔→扔下去→服从的,扔下去大家讨论的主题
ad增加+ject投掷,扔+ive……的→扔上去的,附加的
eject[v.投出,掷出]+ion表名词→n.喷出, 排出物
inter在……中间+ject投掷,扔+ion表名词→在句子中间扔出的字→感叹词

stems_affixes.value_cn: 物体;客体,对象;目标;宾语
stems_affixes.word_buile: ob逆,反+ject投掷,扔→反着扔→反对→引申为扔向目标

stems_affixes.value_cn: [to]反对,异议,不喜欢,反对的理由
stems_affixes.word_buile: object反对+ion表名词→n.[to]反对,异议,不喜欢,反对的理由
object[n.物体;客体,对象;目标;宾语 v.[to]反对]+ive……的→客观的[词性变化:作名词,表示"目标,目的"]
pro向前+ject扔→扔向前面→投射;引申为工程项目
project[v.投射出;n.工程项目]+ile物体→向前扔的物体
project[v.投射出;n.工程项目]+ion表名词→n.射出,投射;计划
re回+ject扔回来→拒绝
reject[v.拒绝,抵制,丢弃,排斥,退掉 n.落选者]+ion表名词→n.退回,拒绝
sub在下面+ject投掷,扔→扔下去→服从的,扔下去大家讨论的主题
subject[n.主题;学科 adj.隶属的;易遭..的 v.使隶属]+ion表名词→n.征服
subject主观+ivity表名词→n.主观性, 主观
tra穿+ject投掷,扔+ory范围→扔出去穿过的范围→弹道轨道
con共同+ject投掷,扔+ure表名词→大家一起扔[思想]→推测
de向下+ject投掷,扔→情绪向下扔→沮丧
e出+ject掷→掷出
in进入+ject投掷,扔→扔进去→注射
ob逆,反+ject投掷,扔→反着扔→反对→引申为扔向目标
pro向前+ject扔→扔向前面→投射;引申为工程项目

stems_affixes.value_cn: 拒绝,抵制,丢弃,排斥,退掉
stems_affixes.word_buile: re回+ject扔回来→拒绝
sub在下面+ject投掷,扔→扔下去→服从的,扔下去大家讨论的主题

Sentence.sentence: The size of the objects shown.
Boys pay more attention to moving objects than girls
Why does the author object to classifying parenting as a personal choice?

sentences.en: The building is the main object of his interest.
sentences.cn: 他最感兴趣的是这栋建筑物。

means.word_mean: 目标; 意向; 目的

sentences.en: Our object is to get at the truth.
sentences.cn: 我们的目的是弄清事实真相。

sentences.en: What an object you look in that old hat!
sentences.cn: 你戴着那顶旧帽子, 样子可真怪!

sentences.en: Verbs that do not take object are called intransitive verbs.
sentences.cn: 不带宾语的动词称为不及物动词。

means.word_mean: 不赞成, 反对; 抗议

sentences.en: I will not wear this dress if you object to it.
sentences.cn: 如果你不喜欢这件衣服，那我就不再穿它了。

sentences.en: They objected that the plan was risky.
sentences.cn: 他们反对说, 这项计划是冒险的。

sentences.en: It may be objected that not enough manpower is available.
sentences.cn: 有人可能会提出反对, 认为没有足够的人力可用。

jushi.english: A portion of the waves is there reflected from the object encountered and forms what is referred to as the echo signal.
jushi.chinese: 一部分波从所遇到的物体反射回来,形成一种信号,称为回波信号。

jushi.english: The object of his novel writing is to amuse and enlighten the general reader.
jushi.chinese: 他写小说的目的在于使一般读者得到娱乐并受到教育。

jushi.english: The whole object of all the child's affection was a soft toy.
jushi.chinese: 那孩子最心爱的东西是个柔软的玩具。
